subject: Medicine
title: The Beecher Battlefield Study
description: A micro-lesson that makes The Beecher Battlefield Study usable.

hook.text: A World War II medic ran out of morphine on the battlefield.

buildup.text: Henry Beecher injected saline and told soldiers it was morphine.

discovery.text: Many soldiers reported genuine pain relief from salt water.

twist.text: This experience inspired his landmark 1955 placebo paper.

climax.text: It forever changed how medicine tests new drugs.

quiz.question: What did Beecher give soldiers when morphine ran out?
